alert.note: Alert for Logan; Sherman; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 10:11PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wallace, northwestern Logan and Sherman Counties through 1000 PM MDT/1100 PM CDT/... At 910 PM MDT/1010 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles south of Kanorado to 12 miles southeast of Weskan. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ruleton around 930 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Sharon Springs, Goodland and Wallace. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 1 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
